page.title: 15School Dinners
page.content: Even though it is only a small school, meals are cooked on the premises at {Stretton Handley.}There are 4 dinner staff. The teaching staff sit with the children for dinner. The cost of the meal is{45p}including a milk drink.The menu for the week ending 5th July was: {Mon:}Hotdogs with onions, chips and baked beans. Rice pudding with jam. {Tue:}Cornish pasty, boiled potatoes, carrots and gravy. Mousse. {Wed:}Roast pork,apple sauce,roast potatoes, cauliflower, gravy. Corn- flake tart and custard. {Thu:}Chicken curry with rice,roast potatoes,mixed vegetables, Branston pickle.Iced shortbread. {Fri:}Surfburger, spaghetti, chips. Spongecake. After dinner the children play games such as'lurky' and use bats and balls. When it snows children bring sledges.
